body: Harvested my first #tomatoes from the #garden today! So proud of these little guys. #gardening #homegrown

comments.body: Those look amazing! Homegrown tomatoes taste way better than store-bought, right?
@34343 Absolutely! They’re so much sweeter. I can’t wait to use them in a salad later!
Wow, those look perfect! How long did it take for them to grow?
@45454 Thanks! It took about 3 months from planting to harvest. I had to keep an eye on them every day!
Do you have any tips for growing tomatoes? Mine always seem to wither before they ripen.
@56565 Make sure they get plenty of sunlight and water consistently, but not too much! Also, using a good quality soil makes a big difference.
Are you going to make some homemade tomato sauce with those beauties?
@67676 That’s the plan! I’m going to make a big batch this weekend. Nothing beats fresh sauce from homegrown tomatoes.
I’m so impressed! I can barely keep a houseplant alive. What else are you growing?
@78787 Haha, thanks! I’ve got some herbs like basil and mint growing too, and I’m trying cucumbers next!
